Email the test report if its true and don't send if its false

Sensor GW build version
Log level info,Options available[debug, info, warning, error, critical]

Ample Login - Password

Path where input files are placed
local default download path
Publish the executed results to Hiptest(true - publish, false - Dont publish)

test run id of hip test

Hiptest Login - Password

IP address of cellular device-2 for communicating with the device
OTAP configure details - on what day OTAP should happen
OTAP configure details - on what time OTAP should start from
OTAP configure details - OTAP end time

Date for which Line monitoring data is available

Year for which Line monitoring data is available
